name: Home (itch) (Koala | Nick)
description:
Come in, take a load off, and unwind... you're home.

Just simple WASD controls to move around.  Not a necessity, but there's three streetlights hidden around the map.  Can you find them?

Just a small project made for CDM 175 and the first game I've ever created.  Simply consists of a dining room and kitchen.  Nothing much to do other than walk around and enjoy the atmosphere and reminisce on memories gone by.

Shout out to Xerial for the cube idea.  Here's their game https://xerial.itch.io/static-rooms.  Check it out it's actually cool.
